title: Trimalleolar Fracture-Dislocation of the Ankle with a Double Fragment of the Medial Malleolus: A Separate Fracture Subtype?
patient: A 22-year-old female teacher sustained a trimalleolar fracture with posterior dislocation of her right ankle (). The fracture pattern was similar to the first patient, and she described an SER mechanism of injury too. A standard medial approach was used to fix both medial malleolar fragments with screws ().
